attributes.action: Increase the punishment for those who steal cars
attributes.additional_details: Because the number of car theft has increased very high since 2018 and nothing is done . Police cannot do nothing if they got footage and is not clear . Cars will never be found and the person need to go through difficult steps with the insurance for getting back their value of the car.Who pay the stress , the time off which need to be taken from job ,etc?
attributes.background: To change the law for all type of theft. Otherwise they will keep doing if they will get suspended  or maximum 6 months. Increasing the years will deter from doing it

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Increase the minimum sentence for stealing a motor vehicle to five years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600561
